page.title: 04THE SILVER END HOTEL
page.content: Silver End Hotel,centrally situated in the village,was built 59 years ago providing a 16 bedroom,up to date accommodation for the many visitors to the village,amongst whom,has been H.G. Wells and Ramsey MacDonald.11 letting double bedrooms and 3 separate bath rooms is now the present accommodation providing work for the manager and 6 staff,some of whom live in the village Recent famous visitors have been well known footballers,Trevor Brooking and Mike Flanagan.The restaurant seats 70 people and the one cook caters for meals from 7:30pm until 10:30pm.Busy days are Fridays and weekends and the 3 bars are full most evenings.The hotel caters for celebrations and most guests are businessmen with a few more visitors in summer.
